remarks: Append an additional value to a function.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fmptapd.0a $e |- ( ph -> A e. _V ) $.
fmptapd.0b $e |- ( ph -> B e. _V ) $.
fmptapd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( R u. { A } ) = S ) $.
fmptapd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> C = B ) $.
fmptapd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. R |-> C ) u. { <. A , B >. } ) = ( x e. S |-> C ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
$d ph x $.
